function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Significant declines in urban park visitation during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Reduced access to outdoor spaces may lead to increased indoor crowding and higher risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Promoting safe outdoor activities and implementing measures to ensure safe park visitation","Technologies":"Information dissemination platforms for promoting outdoor activities and monitoring park capacity","People":"Residents, especially those in socially vulnerable communities","Owner":"Local governments and community organizations"},{"Description":"Exacerbation of preexisting disparities in park use due to COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Marginalized populations face compounded health risks due to reduced access to outdoor spaces","Mitigation":"Addressing environmental justice concerns, providing targeted support for socially vulnerable communities, and creating equitable access to outdoor spaces","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms and targeted outreach programs","People":"BIPOC and low socioeconomic status residents","Owner":"Community organizations and local governments"},{"Description":"Variable patterns of outdoor recreation and park use during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Difficulty in implementing consistent public health measures and guidelines for outdoor activities","Mitigation":"Conducting local studies to understand specific patterns and tailoring public health messages and regulations accordingly","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools for studying local park use patterns","People":"Public health authorities, local governments, and researchers","Owner":"Research institutions and public health organizations"}]}
